channel.title: Little magic help plzz
channel.description: i have a pimpscape source and i made it that i need runes to do eny damage but if i dont have eny runes and if i try to cast a spell on a npc it does 0 damage and the npc starts to attack me!! how do i make it that if i dont have eny runes and if i cast a spell that it only says u need runes to cast this spell instead to do 0 damage and says u need runes to cast this spell?? (i kno little complicated) thanks
